flawed_nl_solution:
The first three cash prizes sum to $200 + $150 + $120= $<<200+150+120=470>>470
The remaining amount of cash prizes to be distributed is $800 - $470= $<<800-470=330>>330
The number of novels left to be awarded is 18 - 3= <<18-3=10>>10 novels
So each writer from 4th to 18th will earn $330 / 10= $<<330/10=33.0>>33.0

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 15, not 10. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
